Name: Blocky Racer - Endless Arcade Racing
Description:
From the makers of Blocky Football and Agent Dash comes a racing game everyone can play. Featuring simple controls with dynamic one-tap drifting and exhilarating speed boosts, charge through multiple stages where split-second overtaking wins the race! Collect and level-up cars to increase your score combo.

ADORABLE CHARACTERS
Build your race team with cute drivers and crazy vehicles, including a popstar driving a sports car, a ninja piloting a stealth-copter, a princess riding in a magical carriage and a monkey in a barrel.

BEAUTIFUL SCENERY
Drive through a living, breathing island circuit with tight corners and flowing straights. Beautiful varied scenery through countryside, rocky mountains, twisting forest roads, a valley lagoon with suspension bridge and beachside tunnel. Charming scenic details, a lighthouse, log cabins and campfires, railway, sand castles, buckets and spades, confetti trumpets and waving inflatable tube men!

FRESH STYLE
Introducing a fresh blocky look, that mixes retro style with modern graphical techniques and special effects.

FEATURES
• A racing game everyone can play
• 30 adorable characters with crazy vehicles
• Huge island circuit with stunning scenery
• Collect and level-up cars to increase score combo
• Stunning retro style mixed with modern techniques

facebook.com/fullfatgames
twitter.com/fullfatgames
www.fullfat.com

Name: 3D Go Kart Parking PRO - Full High Speed Racer Version
Description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

You're about to get behind the wheel of a super fast go-kart racing machine.... are you ready??

In this ultra realistic racing and parking game, you need to do two things. 

First, you have to navigate a variety of twists and turns to get to your checkpoint. Each checkpoint adds time to your game. As long as you reach each checkpoint, you'll be able to continue racing. 

Second, once you cross the finish line, you have to successfully park your go kart. Sounds easy? It's not! 

In summary, this game is a mix between a classic racing game, mixed in with a challenging parking simulator. You get the best of both worlds!

FEATURES

- All go karts unlocked!
- Realistic super HD 3D graphics.
- 10 levels to unlock!
- Multiple camera views.
- Multiple sterring options.

Name: Apocalyptic Prison Break Out Escape the G-A-T New York Jail Police
Description:
The Apocalypse has devastated New York and prison security has now failed along with all outside communication. Electric compound gates no longer stand in the way of freedom, so this is your chance to escape across the downtown rooftops in this addictive endless runner game.

Rogue cops will be in force so whatever you do, don’t stop running! Make your way through the devastated City wasteland, jump and slide past abandoned bill boards and shutters, duck under the giant cranes that still deliver wood and frozen in time. Set your energy for an all time high and grab all the power drinks you can, wherever you can as you don’t have much time until dawn approaches.

Can you escape before your vital energy runs out? Will you forever fall into the dark City depths?

Features:

- Addictive Apocalypse Runner
- Jump and Slide to outrun the Cops
- Replenish your energy with power drinks

Find Us Online:-

Facebook : Facebook.com/RisingHighApps
Twitter: @RisingHighApps
Web: www.RisingHigh.net

Name: Choky Road
Description:
Choky Road is a unique, amazing and stunning idea.

We are 100% sure your never played such a addictive puzzle game before.  

Concentration is the key to success.

Timing is key, as you have to tap at just the right moment. The game gets more challenging and difficult with progression. Your goal is to tap to jump and change line. Any wrong move you'll have to start again. 

Remember : Avoid obstacles to set a new record.

This game seems very easy at start. But its gradually increasing difficulty and speed make it hard to put a high score.

Choky Road is an arcade game published under the banner of Game Criteria. Game Criteria also published famous games like Guide the Dots, Tunnel Racer 3D and Shift the Gravity which are most popular arcade games too.

Are you ready to play accept challenge ?

How to play:
- Tap to change the line
- Tap to jump  

It's that simple. But you won't be able to go that far.

Features:
- Addictive Gameplay
- Easy to learn, hard to master
- Simple, attractive graphics
- Impossible challenges
- Brainless control
- Amazing Game-Play
- Cool sound fx

Feel free to give us your precious feedback.

Name: SF - Everton News Edition
Description:
***** Unofficial app ******
All the news & videos about Everton FC in a single app.
We cover all main football sources, and Youtube channels and bring you a clean & effective summary to follow the club you love !

Features include:

* A news summary covering stories from all sources ! Clean feed with no duplication. For each story - see all sources that covered it with a simple tap !

* Push notifications for prominent stories and/or your chosen topics (optional) !

* A community of Everton fans! Post stories or polls, comment on stories, and tag articles!

* Live scoreboard!

* Videos curated from Youtube channels - all about The Toffees

* Read later - save interesting stories easily and for free! 

* Customized news feed - Choose your favorite topics or completely block topics from your feed! Read only the news that interest you!

* Social summary around the stories - see what the people you follow on Twitter had to say on the stories you read !

* Block source - filter out unwanted sources

iPhone Only Features - 

* Collapsed mode - an effective reading mode! Skim through the news and decide what you want to read, save or share!


What else do you need, really ?
Enjoying the app? Not satisfied? Whatever it is - we’re waiting to hear from you. Please write us what’s on your mind to support@newsfusion.com


Use of the Sportfgusion Application is governed by the Sportfusion Terms of Use (http://newsfusion.com/terms-privacy-policy).

Name: Two Roads
Description:
Escape through Two Roads to your way home.

A happy go lucky alien named Frothy is trapped on earth for a long time. Finally got a chance to escape!!!
But to reach his home he has to go through the only way, which is named as Two Roads.

Two Roads has 2 roads vertically parallel over each other, which will lead to his destination, Wait!! It’s not so simple the roads have many obstacles designed to stop intruders from invading.
Move through it and try not to hit obstacles, remember you have to reach your home your destination.

The rules are simple:

- Swipe Up, Down and Right, Left to switch between Roads and Lanes.
- Avoid hitting the obstacles with power-ups. But destroy when on power-ups.
- Make Hi-Score.

Two Roads is a simple/easy game to play.

Features:

- Blaze (Raze mode): 4-second boost speed with no death.
- Turbo: 3-Second boost speed with 1 life.
- Magnet: 4-second attract nearby magnet.
- Shield: Protect you from 1 hit.
- Upgrades.
- Avatars.

Name: What Now?!
Description:
London’s smartest map and city guide that makes full use of your phone! 

Want to make the most of your time in the best city in the world? Then download our FREE London app now! It’s got all the best sights, hottest restaurants and info at your fingertips. It works offline, so no roaming charges!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Expensive data roaming making your smart mobile device not-so-smart?!  At last there’s a London city guide that lets you use your smart phone abroad as you would back home!

We’ve created a clever travel app that thinks and behaves likes its connected to the internet, even when it’s not. So now you can take your mobile with you abroad and let us be your guide to your day and nights out in London.

What Now!? has been selected by Techcrunch as one of their Top 15 European Startups and named by PhoCusWright Travel Research as one of the Top Travel Innovations of 2013.

 

FEATURES
----------------------------
- Offline maps and GPS which avoid data roaming charges
- Restaurant, café & bar guide include ratings and reviews
- All the sights and tourist attractions
- Background information and history of London
- Plan personalised itineraries and walking routes
- How to get from A to B using public transport (tube, bus and on foot)
- Hottest nightlife guide
- Find out what’s near you
- All amenities (police station, chemist etc)
- Up to date information from Foursquare, Yelp and Wikipedia

All available for FREE in the app and when you’re OFFLINE!

 
How to use the app
----------------------------------------
- Connect the app to Wi-Fi at your hotel, apartment or before you leave.
- Use the app to research and plan your days / nights itinerary
- What Now pulls all the relevant information and squeezes it into your phone
- And provides a personalised route planner & map to guide you
- Go offline and use the app to discover great new sights, restaurants and nightlife while out and about.
- Our app will also show you other areas of interest that are near you and for you to discover.
- Access the complete history and background information to London, along with details on all amenities.

Again, it’s totally free to download, free to use and no roaming charges! And no catches!


What people are saying:
“What a great idea!  I don’t need a Lonely Planet or paper map anymore!”
“I love how I can see useful transit info, even when I’m off-line”
“I can finally use my smartphone as I would back home!”
“This whole thing works perfectly off-line – so there’s no roaming charges.  And the app’s free too!”
What Now Travel?! is currently only available in London but more cities and places coming soon.

We’re passionate about smarter mobile travelling and your feedback and ideas are important to us. So email us at contact@whatnowtravel.com with any questions or feedback.


Download What Now?! and let us be your guide!

 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Visit our website: www.whatnowtravel.com
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/whatnowtravel
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/whatnowtravel

Name: Goat Turbo Attack
Description:
You can be a goat. 
You can be a goat and destroy everything. 
You can be a goat, but also a Chtuluh, a Gotzilla, a Pig, a Unicorn, a Pug, a Bull and much more.

Take your imagination to new racing adventures! Race through the city, destroy everything that is on your way and collect coins. But be aware, because you’re not alone! Escape the POLICE, the EVIL ROBOTS and the ZOMBIES! How long can you last?

You can make turbo attacks, create mayhem and brag to your friends that you have a goat to destroy everything! Challenge your friends to beat your high score in the online leaderboards!

This helps us to develop many other engaging games.

Name: Kelvin's Saigon Cupcake Adventure - Free Scooter Racing Game
Description:
Kelvin loves cruising around the busy streets of South Central Saigon looking for a tasty treat. 

But it's dangerous driving his scooter at high speeds avoiding oncoming traffic from every angle. The further through the city you drive, the more cupcakes and cake pops you collect, the more risky it becomes.  How many cupcakes and cake pops can you collect without crashing? 

---------------- 
Here's how the game works: 

-  Gameplay is simple and becomes more challenging as you avoid other scooters.

- Slide your thumb or a finger on Kelvin and his scooter at the bottom of the screen to drive forward, back, up and down to avoid obstacles.

- Collect cupcakes and cake pops to unlock different scooters and racers to complete your mission.

- The longer you play, the faster the game moves. Each time you play Kelvin's Saigon Cupcake Adventure, it changes so you never play the same game twice 

- Gamecenter Leaderboards let you see how you score compared to other players by how long you're able to survive and collect cupcakes & cake pops.

- Challenge your friends to beat your score! 
----------------

Name: Number War 4 Kids
Description:
Wanted: World's Smartest Gamers 
Skills: Ability To Add Numbers 1 through 7. 

Number War - A Free Puzzle Board Game 

Number War is a very simple to learn, quick to play, but extremely challenging Iphone , iPod, & iPad strategy board game. Think of it as "Chess With Numbers". 

Using a 7x7 board & 49 Number Chips,. 
There are 7 Number Chips of each number: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 making 49 total Number chips.

Number War is a iphone strategy board game that combines the logic of chess, the simplicity of Go, and the risk-reward elements of poker. It requires players to be able to calculate a variety of possible moves quickly while planning several moves in advance. 


Number War is a very simple game. It really has one rule. 

A played die captures/scores any lower value die in the ROW AND COLUMN it is played in. The Player scores the total value of all captured dice, and the captured dice change to the value of the played die. 



100% Free 1 Player & 2 Player Gaming! 


4 Game Variations: 


Number War Standard 

Quick Rules 

1. A Played Die captures & scores the total value of any dice of LOWER value in BOTH the ROW & COLUMN it is played in. 

2. Captured dice are changed to the value of the played die but stay on the board. A Played die Does Not score any dice of Equal or Greater value. 

3. Highest Score Wins. 


Number War Plus 

The Value of the played Die is added to any scoring play. Non scoring plays recive no points. 


Number War Domino 

Number War Dominos style. Die MUST be placed adjacent to a die on the board. Any of the 8 squares around a die on the board is a legal play. 


Number War Twisted 

Try scoring the LEAST amount of points. Same rules, just the completely opposite Goal! Extremely challenging. 


2 Skill Levels 


BEGINNER - Easier AI. Dice are played in neutral color making it easy to count how many sevens have been played. 

Expert - Difficult AI. Dice get played in their respective Number War color requiring players to remember what has been played. 


3 Dice Variations 

Choose to play with 1, 3, or 5 dice in hand. 


ADJUSTABLE TIMER 

Set turn time to 15, 30, or 60 seconds. 


MULTIPLAYER via GAME CENTER 

Play your friends or people from around the world via Game Center. 



LEADERBOARDS & RANKING SYSTEM 

One Player Leaderboard - See who is best against the computer. Leaderboards for each variation and an Overall Leaderboard. 


Two Player Leaderboard Ranking System 

Both the winner and loser get leaderboard points in every game! How much they get is dependent upon how well they played. 

Not only does Number War have a two player leaderboard for every variation and an overall grand master leader, but also a unique leader point system that rewards great losing play more than easy victories. 

Well played games are awarded more points to split between players. Close games split the point nearly evenly. Thus playing a hard fought, well played game that ends in defeat gives both the winner and loser more leader points than a winner in a poorly played blowout. 

Finally a game leaderboard that recognizes that a well played loss deserves nearly as much recognition as a well played victory! 

Only by quitting a match will you receive no leaderboard points. So do your best and even in defeat you will be rewarded! 


Best of all, the basic game app is FREE for Iphone, Ipod & Ipad! Available in Single Player and Two Player via Gamecenter. 


Number War - A Free Puzzle Board Game For Ages 5-100+

Name: Birdie - Make the Tiny Bird Fly
Description:
Birdie has one goal to be the best flyer in all the land. 

Help Birdie realise his dream by putting your flying skills to the test in our dynamic obstacle course. 
Master the art of the two finger tap, as you fly Birdie across the ever changing environment, but remember death is always just one wrong tap away. 

Designed for beginners and masters alike Birdie provides the perfect blend of skill based challenges. Simple to learn impossible to defeat, Birdie will keep you hooked for hours of gameplay goodness. Best of all it’s totally free to download and conquer. 

Test your reflexes and flying skills, against Birdie pilots across the globe and climb the game centre leader board to become the best of the best. 
Full touch enabled control dynamics, the screen is your joystick. 
Intuitive difficulty progression, the further you fly the harder it gets. 
Beautifully rendered in our classic Rich 2D. Birdie looks as good as it plays.

Name: Kelvin's Saigon Cupcake Scooter Racing Adventure HD
Description:
He's back and he wants his cupcakes!  That loveable boy is bobbing and weaving through traffic avoiding danger to get those delicious treats.  Only this time - it's even more extreme.  The stakes are raised as more scooter--riders are coming at you faster than ever and from every direction.

How bad do you want those tasty little cakes covered in sweet creamy frosting?  We're about to find out

---------------- 
Here's how the game works: 

-  Gameplay is simple and becomes more challenging as you avoid other scooters.

- Tilt your device to the left or right to move your scooter left or right to oncoming traffic

- Collect cupcakes to unlock different scooters and racers to complete your mission.

- The longer you play, the faster the game moves. Each time you play Kelvin's Saigon Cupcake Adventure, it changes so you never play the same game twice 

- Gamecenter Leaderboards let you see how you score compared to other players by how long you're able to survive and collect cupcakes.

- Challenge your friends to beat your score! 
----------------
